resources.string: Invalid password: must be at least 6 chars, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one symbol between @#$%^&+=!?
Do you want to send this video?
You are now going to describe a random image. At the end of the video, you will have to declare if you lied or said the truth.

"In this phase of the game you will record your description of a random image you are provided with using your camera. 
 
 • The objective of this phase is to trick your opponent: don't let him know if you're really describing the image you see or just making up details! 
 • Remember you only have at most 15 seconds to record your description! 
 • If you're not happy with your description, you can try again 3 times! Note that with every attempt you will receive a different image. 
 • After recording you're going to declare if you said the truth or a lie, no cheating! "
Ask a tricky question to your opponent!

"In this phase of the game you're going to ask your opponent a question. 
 
 • The objective in this phase is to ask a question that's neither too easy nor too complicated; your opponent has to be able to answer but you should give him a hard time! 
 • Try not to ask a question that allows a simple Yes/No answer, your opponent might easily trick you! 
 • Remember that your opponent has at most 15 seconds to record his answer! 
 
 Some examples of tricky questions could be: 
 • Have you ever stolen something, even little, from anyone? And whose was it? 
 • Have you ever bathed at night? When?
"
A turn based game in which you and your opponent will deceive each other by describing funny images and judging the veridicity of the descriptions.
It\'s your turn: describe what you will see! (or lie!)
It\'s your turn: answer the question!
It\'s your turn: is it a lie?
Wait: your opponent is describing what he sees!
Wait: your opponent is scanning you!
Choose your nickname! It is the name your opponents will see!
Your nickname should be shorter than 8 characters, with no special characters in it. This name is not unique and should not be offensive for anyone.
One moment, we are setting up your account...
A communication error occurred with the server. Try later.
One moment, we\'re getting your information back...
One moment, we\'re updating your nickname...
One moment, we\'re looking for a new game...
One moment, we\'re sending your opinion...
One moment, we\'re sending your question...
To work properly, the app needs these permissions active:
You will ask your opponents questions by simply writing them in a text form. Try to come up with something tricky or embarassing!
To describe the image you\'re provided with, you will record yourself speaking with your camera, don\'t let them know if you\'re faithful to the image or using your imagination!
You will judge your opponent\'s description, trying to guess if they are lying or not. If you guess right, you win a point!
One moment, we\'re loading your description...
Remember: the most important thing is to have fun!

This game was developed for a research project by two students of the Master's Degree in Computer Science at the University of Padua.

The purpose of this app is to improve an AI system on Lie Detection.

For more information, contact nnavarin@math.unipd.it.
Are you sure you want to give up?
This way you will lose the match.

You and your opponent will fight for 3 rounds! In every round you will each describe an image and judge the opponent\'s description!\nCaution: after giving your judgment, you will have to wait for the round to end to see the points!
Wait, we are selecting an image for you...
Incorrect username and password. Try again.
You may send the video anyways or resign the round. Do you want to send the video?
indicated that he was telling the truth
indicated that he had told a lie
You will now see your opponent\'s description, you\'re going to judge if it\'s the truth or a lie.

You are now going to see your opponent\'s description in video format. You are going to judge if it\'s the truth or a lie, if your decision matches what your opponent declared, you will win a point, if not, your opponent will. If you see anything inappropriate in the video, don\'t hesitate to report it using the report button.
"No request to participate in a match present. "
"List of requests to start a new game: "
"Search and select a player, a request will be sent to him. In case he also wants to play against you, then you can play against each other. "
"Choose who you want to play against: "
{NICKNAME} reported this video as {TRUTH}: did it describe the image correctly?
"Are you sure you want to exit the account? "
Enter your account email address and we will send you an email containing a new password.
We have sent an email containing the new password to the address you indicated. Check also in the spam folder.

This operation will delete all your data present in our system. We remind you that the use of data by this application is for research purposes only. Are you sure you want to delete the account and related data?
The opponent has deleted his account, so it is not possible to continue the game.
" Use the search bar to find a player."

Accetto di partecipare al progetto di ricerca descritto nella nota informativa qui allegata e condotto dal prof. Nicolò Navarin (nnavarin@math.unipd.it, Ricercatore a Tempo Determinato B presso il Dipartimento di Matematica, membro HIT) con la collaborazione del prof. Claudio Palazzi (membro HIT), della prof.ssa Ombretta Gaggi (membro HIT) e della dott.ssa Merylin Monaro (Dipartimento di Psicologia Generale). 

1. Mi sono state fornite informazioni sufficienti su questo progetto di ricerca e le mie domande hanno ricevuto una risposta soddisfacente. Lo scopo della ricerca mi è stato spiegato ed è chiaro.

2. La mia partecipazione è volontaria. Non vi è alcuna coercizione esplicita o implicita a partecipare.

3. Dichiaro di essere maggiorenne. 

4. Ho il diritto di non rispondere a nessuna delle domande. Se mi sento in qualche modo a disagio durante la sessione sperimentale ho il diritto di ritirarmi dall’esperimento in qualsiasi momento. 

5. Mi è stata data l’esplicita garanzia che il ricercatore non mi identificherà per nome o funzione in nessun report basato su questo studio e che la mia riservatezza come partecipante a questo studio è assicurata. In tutti i casi, i successivi utilizzi di record e dati saranno soggetti alle politiche di utilizzo dei dati standard dell'UE (Data Protection Policy). 

6. Mi è stata data la garanzia che questo progetto di ricerca è stato rivisto e approvato dalla Commissione Etica del Centro HIT

1. Mi è stato spiegato adeguatamente ed ho compreso a pieno lo scopo dello studio. 

2. Acconsento al trattamento dei dati personali raccolti durante la sessione a cui ho partecipato per il progetto condotto dal prof. Nicolò Navarin (nnavarin@math.unipd.it, Ricercatore a Tempo Determinato B presso il Dipartimento di Matematica, membro HIT) con la collaborazione del prof. Claudio Palazzi (membro HIT), della prof.ssa Ombretta Gaggi (membro HIT) e della dott.ssa Merylin Monaro (Dipartimento di Psicologia Generale). 

3. Sono consapevole che la cancellazione dei dati potrà avvenire in qualsiasi momento direttamente attraverso la app oppure contattando il ricercatore principale (nnavarin@math.unipd.it)

1. Acconsento che i video, e le immagini tratte da essi, raccolti durante la sessione sperimentale possano essere utilizzate durante la presentazione dello studio e nella pubblicazione dei suoi risultati. \n\n2. Sono consapevole di avere il diritto di richiedere la cancellazione o la rettifica dei miei dati (Artt. 15, 16, 17 GDPR) direttamente attraverso la app oppure contattando il ricercatore principale (nnavarin@math.unipd.it). Sono a conoscenza del fatto che non sarà possibile cancellare le immagini già riportate in pubblicazioni scientifiche.
You have to select an item.
" In order to proceed you must agree."
"In order to register, it is necessary to fill in all the items of the informative consent. "
"The password must be at least 1 character long and maximum 10. "
"{NICKNAME} reported this video as TRUTH: can you confirm that the description matches the image? "
"{NICKNAME} reported this video as a LIE: do you confirm that the description DOES NOT match the picture? "
"The image is not available because it may have been deleted from the database. Contact an administrator if necessary. "
